nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner. You are not authorized."

arguments.value: You are not the owner. You are not authorized.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not the owner. You are not authorized."

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You attempted to add permissions to 0x0 address."

arguments.value: You attempted to add permissions to 0x0 address.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You attempted to add permissions to 0x0 address."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a _newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
